c74object.name: rbiquad~
c74object.description: rbiquad~ is a biquad filter that accepts only signal rate coefficients. The memory can be cleared on a sample-accurate basis, using a dedicated reset input. In granular applications with filtering per voice this allows correct reset of the filter before each new grain.

method.name: signal
method.description:
In first inlet: An audio signal to be filtered.
In second inlet: The 0th feedforward coefficient (this can be generated using filtercoeff~).
In third inlet: The 1st feedforward coefficient (this can be generated using filtercoeff~).
In the fourth inlet: The 2nd feedforward coefficient (this can be generated using filtercoeff~).
In the fifth inlet: The 1st feedback coefficient (this can be generated using filtercoeff~).
In the sixth inlet: The 2nd feedback coefficient (this can be generated using filtercoeff~).
In the seventh inlet: A trigger signal used to clear the filters memory. In granular applications with filtering per voice this allows correct reset of the filter before each new grain.
